*   >🇨🇳 此主题已在Mac和Windows平台上测试，支持跟随系统样式自动切换浅色和深色模式<br>🇬🇧 This theme has been tested on Mac and Windows platforms,it supports automatically switch theme mode based on the appearance of the system

    # Typora foresee theme

    ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Author-passwordgloo-blueviolet?logo=github&amp;style=flat")&emsp;![](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/passwordgloo/typora-foresee-theme?logo=Git)&emsp;![](https://img.shields.io/badge/passwordgloo-7-white?logo=bilibili&logoColor=white&labelColor=FE7398&amp;style=flat)&emsp;![](https://img.shields.io/badge/麦田守望者-92-white?logo=zhihu&logoColor=white&labelColor=0084ff&amp;style=flat)&emsp;![](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=white&label=%E7%BD%91%E6%98%93%E4%BA%91%E9%9F%B3%E4%B9%90&query=%24.data.totalSubs&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.spencerwoo.com%2Fsubstats%2F%3Fsource%3DneteaseMusic%26queryKey%3D1732207004&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=d62f2e)

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/271819148-aa5cd28e-6876-4729-9865-e29001e1147c.png)中文	|	![](/media/theme/foresee/271819155-72fe5b24-cd1c-4ceb-a32d-e559dbcaea63.png)[English](Readme.md)

    ---

    ## 感谢

    基于默认主题`night`修改

    选中样式受 [typora-dyzj-theme](https://github.com/muggledy/typora-dyzj-theme) 启发

    ## 如何使用

    1. 克隆仓库,或者[下载压缩包](https://github.com/passwordgloo/Typora-foresee-theme/archive/refs/heads/study.zip)
    2. Typora依次打开设置>外观>主题，点击按钮`打开主题文件夹`
    3. 复制粘贴到Typora主题文件夹

    ## 特点

    - 根据系统外观设置自动切换主题模式,无需单独设置深色主题
    - 用户自定义颜色配置
    - 模块化设计思路

    - 使用 `scss` 格式替代原先的 `css`

    ## 突出亮点

    ### 标题

    重新调整标题样式，添加专注模式下样式

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_17-23-46.gif)

    ### 引用块

    #### 默认引用块

    默认引用块使用主题色单色

    你可以输入 <kbd>></kbd> 去插入默认引用块

    ![](https://img.picgo.net/2024/07/24/2024-07-24-21.25.2306902135529210e2.png)

    #### 变化的引用块

    引用块样式随标题级别不同而不同

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_17-40-31.gif)

    #### 渐变引用块

    ```html
    <blockquote alt = 'green'>green</blockquote>
    <blockquote alt = 'blue'>blue</blockquote>
    <blockquote alt = 'orange'>orange</blockquote>
    <blockquote alt = 'purple'>purple</blockquote>
    <blockquote alt = 'red'>red</blockquote>
    ```

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_17-17-04.png)

    - 在文件夹`icon`友情提供小图标

    > 复制并保存到电脑本地固定位置，图片直接引用文件即可

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/badge592266035bf8b236067398135730b8b5.png)

    #### Github 风格引用块

    ```text
    >[!note]
    >
    
    >[!tip]
    >
    
    >[!warning]
    >
    
    >[!caution]
    >
    
    >[!important]
    >
    ```

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_17-13-52.png)

    ### 提示条

    ```html
    <section alt="note">note text</section>
    <section alt="info">info text</section>
    <section alt="tip">tip text</section>
    <section alt="warning">warning text</section>
    <section alt="caution">caution</section>
    <section alt="important">important</section>
    ```

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_17-15-57.png)

    ### 徽章

    ```html
    <span alt = "black">black</span>
    <span alt = "blue">blue</span>
    <span alt = "green">green</span>
    <span alt = "orange">orange</span>
    <span alt = "purple">purple</span>
    <span alt = "red">red</span>
    ```

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_17-19-26.png)

    ### 代码样式

    > 请在偏好设置>Markdown>打开`显示行号`，以获得更好体验

    1. 支持代码块自定义光标颜色

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_00-01-001bbf1d3c1f79dab1.gif)

    

    2. 根据系统外观使用不同代码样式

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_17-20-32.png)

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/PixPin_2024-08-18_17-20-09.png)

    

    ## 个性化[可选]

    修改`foresee.scss`文件中代码以获得个性化体验

    ```scss
    $display: (
      light:#FFF,
      dark:#666
    );
    
    $article: (
      light:#FFF,
      dark:#323232
    );
    
    $sidebar: (
      light: #F2F2F2,
      dark: #3E3E3E
    );
    
    $textColor: (
      light:#DEDEDE,
      dark:#323232
    );
    
    $tomato: #FF6347;
    
    $purple: #FF00FF;
    
    $blue: #00BFFF;
    
    $green: #00CD66;
    
    $orange: #FF8C00;
    
    $red: #fc6076;
    
    /* You can change theme color and focus color */
    
    $themeColor: $green;
    
    $focusColor: $purple;
    
    /* gradient colors */
    
    $black-gradient: #596164 0%, #868f96 100%;
    
    $blue-gradient: #005bea 0%, #00c6fb 100%;
    
    $red-gradient: #fc6076 0%, #ff9a44 100%;
    
    $orange-gradient: #ff5858 0%, #f09819 100%;
    
    $purple-gradient: #c471f5 0%, #fa71cd 100%;
    
    $green-gradient: #0ba360 0%, #8ed451 100%;
    
    // Custom fonts and style
    
    $border-radius: 6px;
    
    $font-family: "Microsoft YaHei", "PingFang SC", "Arial", "sans-serif";
    
    /* you can change default page width
    #write {
      max-width: 914px;
    } 
    */
    
    ```

    ## 预览

    ### 浅色模式

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/light_mode.png)

    ### 深色模式

    ![](/media/theme/foresee/dark_mode.png)

    ## 项目用途

    *   归档个人学习经验
    *   留下自己学习印迹
    *   启迪他人思想火花
